scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist; cp -R src/index.html static/* dist/; npx tsc src/*.ts --outFile ./dist/app.js
scripts.COMMENT1: checks being performed: Are there any uncommitted files in Git staging area? Are there any modified files in Git? Are there any untracked files in Git?
scripts.prepublish-build-output: echo === Running pre-publish step and checks === && set -x && git diff --cached --exit-code && git diff --exit-code && ! git clean -n | read -n1 && npm run build
scripts.publish-build-output: rm -rf ../build-output/* && commit_hash=$(git log -1 --pretty=%H master) && pushd ../build-output && git checkout ./ && popd && cp -R ./dist/. ../build-output/ && cd ../build-output/ && git add ./ && git commit -m "Updated build output using commit $commit_hash"
